Join us today

Follow the steps below and you'll be a member of Robotics @ Maryland in no time!

How to Become a New Member

1. Join us on OrgSync

https://orgsync.com/64237/chapter

2. Fill out the Form

This form lets us know your interests and skills so we can pair you up with the right subteam.

3. Check us out at the First Look Fair!

We'll be at the First Look Fair so please stop by our booth for more information about us and what we do.

Twitter: @UMDrobotics

Contact Us: software@ram.umd.edu
